title: Account Question
body: I haven't played League in around 3 or 4 months due to vacation, life issues, school, computer problems, etc. I was wondering if there was a way I could lose my account soon, or if I would lose my account, along with my purchases. Will logging into the forums, keep my account active and not be deactivated, or do I need to actually log in and play. I'm expecting my PC issues to be fixed in a couple of weeks.

replies.body:
We don't take accounts away or deactivate them for inactivity. The only thing you risk if you go inactive for **a long time** is your summoner name going up for grabs. This is part of our [Summoner Name cleanup initiative](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-).

I hope your PC issues are sorted soon so you can hit the rift and enjoy some of this new content that was just released. Let me know if you have any questions. ^.^
and the account will still be there if the summoner name gets taken away by the cleanup thing. You *should* get prompted to make a new summoner  name when you play again.
Thanks so much! Can't wait to play again!
